meanings.definition: A V-shaped fortification with two projecting angles.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers hid behind the redan to protect themselves.
meanings.sent2: The redan was strategically placed to defend the fort.
meanings.sent3: The redan looked like a giant arrowhead sticking out of the ground.
meanings.sent4: The redan stood like a guardian with its arms stretched out.
meanings.sent5: The redan's shape made it a formidable obstacle for any approaching enemy.

meanings.definition: A type of military defensive work.
meanings.sent1: The redan was a crucial part of the defensive strategy.
meanings.sent2: Soldiers worked together to build the redan for protection.
meanings.sent3: The redan was so well-built, even the enemy admired its design.
meanings.sent4: The redan symbolized the strength and resilience of the army.
meanings.sent5: The redan's presence instilled confidence in the troops during battle.

meanings.sent1: The redan was constructed using soil and rocks.
meanings.sent2: The redan blended seamlessly with the natural landscape.
meanings.sent3: The redan's design made it look like a giant molehill.
meanings.sent4: The redan provided a sturdy defense without the need for fancy materials.
meanings.sent5: The redan's simplicity belied its effectiveness in protecting the soldiers.
